evidence.claim: Burnham Benefits Insurance Services emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations in their offerings.
The company likely uses cloud services but has no specific API documentation publicly available.
Details on the integration of health data standards like FHIR or HL7 are not prominently featured on their site.
No partnerships or evidence of using specific EHRs or clearinghouses have been noted on their website.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 usage or API automation capabilities.
